name: Timeplosion
description:
Made with Unity for Trijam 82 in a about 4 hours without any pre-made assets.

Control with WSAD. Place bombs with mouse. Escape to pause (with volume control).

Delay by dodging and bombing for 10 seconds to enter revenge phase for the next 10 seconds!

Tips:
Enemies you don't kill come back next phase.
Later rounds grant more points!

Stfoorca - programming, game design, graphics
Silvarc - game design, audio, graphics
